name: The Warehouse (Celestial Doom)
description:
DirectionPush Box

THE WAREHOUSE is a game.

THE WAREHOUSE is a puzzle.

THE WAREHOUSE is the go-anywhere brain teaser for the Game Boy system that you just can't put down.

The game is based on moving crates around in a warehouse. But manual labour won't win the game: it takes brain power to move boxes into their proper spaces to clean up the room and get to the next screen... and the next... and the next!

THE WAREHOUSE is based on the old Game Boy game Boxxle.

Levels 1 thru 10 are clones from BOXXLE, after that, I'm looking at custom created levels.

Levels can be posted in the comments, or contact me and I'll add it to the game.
